## TransportOptions type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type TransportOptions = Array<{
    key: Transports.Console;
    options: ConsoleTransportOptions;
} | {
    key: Transports.Metrics;
    options: MetricsTransportOptions;
}>;
```
